Articles.Content:
KSP2 ver. 0.1.0.0.20892

OS Windows 11

Cpu I5 12600K 32gb ram

GPU AMD 6650 XT 8gb ram

expected: no sun light through the mountains models

observed: a complete full sun and sunflares through mountains models

Steps: just put a ccmmand ship on a landing lane and point in game clock to UT 1:12:00 to UT 1:14:00
no fix

Joint reinforcement and custom flag mods on warp mod loader
